text:
FACT: Black Americans are more likely to suffer from:
Stroke
Heart disease
Breast cancer
Asthma
Cervical cancer
Obesity
Maternal mortality

This #MinorityHealthMonth, let's pledge to reduce racial and ethnic health inequities in the Black community.

html: Cancer, diabetes, heart disease -- across the board, communities of color suffer increased #HealthDisparities for chronic diseases. This #MinorityHealthMonth, I hope all in our community do their part to take care of themselves and their loved ones. #NMHM19

html: “These new actions by the AG reinforce our concern that he is acting to protect Pres Trump. The AG previously stated, ‘I do not believe it would be in the public’s interest for me to attempt to summarize the full report or to release it in serial or piecemeal fashion.’ We agree.”
text: “These new actions by the AG reinforce our concern that he is acting to protect Pres Trump. The AG previously stated, ‘I do not believe it would be in the public’s interest for me to attempt to summarize the full report or to release it in serial or piecemeal fashion.’ We agree.”

html: “In addition, we understand from press reports that the DoJ has had ‘numerous conversations’ with lawyers from the White House about the report. There is no legitimate reason for the Department to brief the White House prior to providing Congress a copy of the report.”

html: Secretary Nielsen oversaw a department that separated families at the border. This is a cruel, inhumane, & unAmerican practice. I'm concerned by the reports that she is resigning because she was not extreme enough on immigration for the White House. We must be better than this.
text:
Secretary Nielsen oversaw a department that separated families at the border. This is a cruel, inhumane, & unAmerican practice.

I'm concerned by the reports that she is resigning because she was not extreme enough on immigration for the White House.

We must be better than this.

html: Kirstjen Nielsen served as Homeland Security Secretary during a sad and shameful chapter in the agency’s history. Nielsen oversaw civil rights and civil liberties violations that will go down as among the worst failures in Trump’s presidency.https://twitter.com/thehill/status/1115029746520346626 …

html: Trump is attempting to eliminate the ACA. He doesn’t get to pick and choose provisions. The whole Law goes away if he wins in court. That means: —No pre-existing conditions protections. —No children on parents’ plans until age 26. —17 million kicked off insurance immediately.
text:
Trump is attempting to eliminate the ACA. He doesn’t get to pick and choose provisions. The whole Law goes away if he wins in court.

That means:
—No pre-existing conditions protections.
—No children on parents’ plans until age 26.
—17 million kicked off insurance immediately.

$8 billion for a wall Congress rejected.
$840 billion in cuts to Medicare.
Trillion dollar deficits for the next four years.

You know what, Mr. President, keep your budget. We’ll take it from here.

html: Mr. President, #opioids kill 130 Americans a day. In 2017, you said this is a public health emergency, but you didn't follow through with funding or action. Declaring a “national emergency” & diverting billions to an ineffective wall won't provide treatment needed to save lives.
text:
Mr. President, #opioids kill 130 Americans a day. In 2017, you said this is a public health emergency, but you didn't follow through with funding or action.

Declaring a “national emergency” & diverting billions to an ineffective wall won't provide treatment needed to save lives.
